ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the healthcare encou
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the healthcare encounter?; If [HODECOD], specify

ReferenceDocuments.name: HOTERM
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: If collected on the CRF, sponsors must use either HODECOD or HOTERM and in some cases, both may be used. If the CRF is collecting healthcare encounters using a standardized sponsor defined code list (e.g., INPATIENT ER, ICU, SURGERY, and GENERAL WARD, PROVIDER OFFICE - PRIVATE, PROVIDER OFFICE - HOSPITAL, GASTROENTEROLOGGIST), then HODECOD may be used to store the code list response. If the CRF collects "Specify, Other" or similar additional free text descriptions of code list items, then HOTERM may be used to store the detailed descriptive text. If HOTERM is entered only as free text, HODECOD would be populated through the sponsor's coding process.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the healthcare encounter or if used with a HODECOD list, "Other" specify.
